name: RealtimeHoustonBusStops
0:
”Alexa, open Houston Transit”
”Alexa, ask Houston Transit to give me information about stop one”
”Tell me about stop one”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: houston transit
des: This skill takes a Metro Houston Bus Stop ID and tells you when the next bus will arrive. Bus schedules are notoriously inaccurate, so this skill only uses real time bus information. You can find your Stop ID displayed at most Bus Stop or by searching Metro's website.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
